thread.title: Russell Westbrook scoffs at All-Star snub: 'I play to win championships'
thread.title_full: Russell Westbrook scoffs at All-Star snub: 'I play to win championships'

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Russell Westbrook scoffs at All-Star snub: 'I play to win championships'
text:
Russell Westbrook scoffs at All-Star snub: 'I play to win championships' It was still an insane snub. Post to Facebook Russell Westbrook scoffs at All-Star snub: 'I play to win championships' It was still an insane snub.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/russell-westbrook-all-star-snub-response/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Russell Westbrook scoffs at All-Star snub: 'I play to win championships' Nina Mandell , USA TODAY Sports 4:15 p.m. ET Jan. 20, 2017 
Russell Westbrook, seen here in a file photo, didn't make the All-Star starters list. (Photo: USA TODAY Sports Images) 
While the world may be wondering why someone who puts up triple doubles almost every night didn't get a starting nod in the All-Star Game, Russell Westbrook seemed completely unfazed by the matter on Friday. Westbrook on All-Star: "I don't play for All-Star nods or All-Star bids." Full video here: pic.twitter.com/4bw3EuNPot â€” Fred Katz (@FredKatz) January 20, 2017 
"I don't play for All-Star nods or All-Star bids. I play to win championships and compete at a high level. It will work out. Just continue to do what I'm doing and play the game the right way." 
Westbrook, of course, could still make the game when the Reserves are announced next week. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/russell-westbrook-all-star-snub-response/ Most Popular
